com.mapbox.services.api.rx.directionsmatrix.v1

Interface DirectionsMatrixServiceRx


  • public interface DirectionsMatrixServiceRx
    Interface that defines the directions matrix service (v5).
    Since:
    2.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.reactivex.Observable<com.mapbox.services.api.directionsmatrix.v1.models.DirectionsMatrixResponse> getObservable(String userAgent, String user, String profile, String coordinates, String accessToken, String destinations, String sources)
      Call-based interface

    • Method Detail

      • getObservable

        @GET(value="directions-matrix/v1/{user}/{profile}/{coordinates}")
io.reactivex.Observable<com.mapbox.services.api.directionsmatrix.v1.models.DirectionsMatrixResponse> getObservable(@Header(value="User-Agent")
                                                                                                                                                                                     String userAgent,
                                                                                                                                                                                     @Path(value="user")
                                                                                                                                                                                     String user,
                                                                                                                                                                                     @Path(value="profile")
                                                                                                                                                                                     String profile,
                                                                                                                                                                                     @Path(value="coordinates")
                                                                                                                                                                                     String coordinates,
                                                                                                                                                                                     @Query(value="access_token")
                                                                                                                                                                                     String accessToken,
                                                                                                                                                                                     @Query(value="destinations")
                                                                                                                                                                                     String destinations,
                                                                                                                                                                                     @Query(value="sources")
                                                                                                                                                                                     String sources)
        Call-based interface
        Parameters:
        userAgent - The user.
        user - The user.
        profile - The profile directions should use.
        coordinates - The coordinates the route should follow.
        accessToken - Mapbox access token.
        destinations - Array of waypoint objects. Each waypoints is an input coordinate snapped to the road and path network. The waypoints appear in the array in the order of the input coordinates, or in the order as specified in the destinations query parameter.
        sources - Array of waypoint objects. Each waypoints is an input coordinate snapped to the road and path network. The waypoints appear in the array in the order of the input coordinates, or in the order as specified in the sources query parameter.
        Returns:
        A retrofit Observable object
        Since:
        2.1.0
